name: Home Invasion: The Dabbening - SparksJam 2016
description:
Home Invasion: The Dabbening!


3rd Place at Sparks Jam!

You are an alien being invaded by monsters and the only way to defeat them is to use the power of THE DAB!

The DAB has been passed down through the generation of your Alien species!

Use your mouse to aim and right click to use THE POWER OF THE DAB!

WASD to move around and Space to jump! :D

Art by Enrique Gándara

Programming by Alan Stewart.

Twitter: @AJSGameDev
